content.raw:
The images are redirecting to `/ftu3/files`, which doesn't exist:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/ftu_gui/ftu3/files/ftu3-boot-screen.png

If you change to `/ftu/files`, they show up:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/ftu_gui/ftu/files/ftu3-boot-screen.png

What I don't understand is why the link to `tut=ftu3` works:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=ftu&tut=ftu3&branch=ftu_gui 

But not the one to `tut=ftu`, which I think should be the correct one:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=ftu&tut=ftu&branch=ftu_gui
content.html:
The images are redirecting to /ftu3/files, which doesn't exist:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/ftu_gui/ftu3/files/ftu3-boot-screen.png

If you change to /ftu/files, they show up:

#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/ftu_gui/ftu/files/ftu3-boot-screen.png

What I don't understand is why the link to tut=ftu3 works:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=ftu&tut=ftu3&branch=ftu_gui

But not the one to tut=ftu, which I think should be the correct one:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=ftu&tut=ftu&branch=ftu_gui
